name: e-com-react-native
description: A boilerplate for a ecommerce mobile app using React Native and Redux. IOs and Android ## FeaturesðŸ”¥ - Login  - Signup - Social Login - Recover Account - Cart (List) - Add To Cart - Remove Cart - Category - Best Selling - Payment Processor (RazorPay) - Profile - Filters - Product Review (Listing) - Write Product Review - Multiple Shipping address - Order History - Wish List (With Redux) - Google Ads (Replace your app id in : AndroidManifest.xml and info.plist)  - Search (Coming soon)
